oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Spørgeskema: Forbrug af dagligvarer, juni 2002
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Wier, Mette
Andersen, Laura Mørch
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Consumer issues
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This questionnaire is mailed to all households in the GfK panel during summer 2002. The purpose is to to supplement GfK-purchase data with information on the individual consumer, including underlying consumer attitudes, perceived good attributes and stated willingness to pay.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Wier, Mette and Andersen, Laura Mørch (2002) Spørgeskema: Forbrug af dagligvarer, juni 2002. [Questionnaire June 2002.] . [Unpublished]
